#summary Format Detection Informations

= Introduction =
Classes in package `org.iotools.formats` try to ease the detection of some widely used file formats.  
These classes works well in this case: a customer can send a file with multiple formats. 

These classes can tell you which is the format of the file "on the fly", without you have to copy it to the disk for reading it twice.
